content:
On the evening of March 22, Russian invaders caused a rocket strike in Odessa. It is not known about the victims.

About thisreportDefense forces of South of Ukraine.

“The enemy continues active unmanned reconnaissance from the sea and again applied Balism in Odessa. He hit the temporarily occupied Crimea, probably "Iskander-M", trying to destroy the infrastructure of the region, ”the message reads.

In the Odessa district, there was a fire in the place of hit, which was promptly eliminated. The information about the victims did not receive.

As reported by the Armyinform, in Odesa region due to the attack of the Russian Federation 260 thousand consumersremainWithout light.
title: The Russians hit the Balism in Odesa region: a fire broke out on the site
description: This was reported by the defense forces of southern Ukraine. “The enemy continues active unmanned ...
author: Army Inform
